# Framework and Attributes 

> The framework for the New Zealand Palaeotsunami Database (Database) is based on a series of key data attributes which help to clarify the nature of the published and unpublished data. These attributes are defined below.

navitems.title: Basemap
navitems.content:
# Basemap attribution 

 The custom basemap was designed and created by [dumpark](http://www.dumpark.com) using layers made available by: 

 - **[LINZ Data Service](https://data.linz.govt.nz)**: New Zealand regions, coastline and islands, lakes, rivers, artificial surfaces, highways, labels, geographic names (Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 New Zealand licence) 
 - **[Natural Earth](http://www.naturalearthdata.com/downloads/)**: Bathymetry, countries 
 - **[NOAA](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/global)**: Hillshade (Amante, C. and B.W. Eakins, 2009. ETOPO1 1 Arc-Minute Global Relief Model: Procedures, Data Sources and Analysis. NOAA Technical Memorandum NESDIS NGDC-24. National Geophysical Data Center, NOAA. doi:10.7289/V5C8276M) 
 - **[Esri](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=0fd0c5b7a647404d8934516aa997e6d9)**: World Ocean Reference (Sources: Esri, DeLorme, HERE, GEBCO, NOAA, National Geographic, Geonames.org, and other contributors)
